pages/custom/category/json:
---
products:
    new:
        limit: 100
    featured:
        limit: 100
    top_sellers:
        limit: 100
categories: false
categories:
    description: false
category:
    description: false
    shop_by_price: true
    products:
        limit: 400
---
{{#partial "page"}}
[
{{#each category.products}}
{"id":{{id}},"name":"{{name}}","brand":"{{brand.name}}","url":"{{url}}","image":"{{getImage image 'product' (cdn theme_settings.default_image_product)}}"{{#each custom_fields}}{{#if name "==" "Company"}},"company":"{{value}}"{{/if}}{{#if name "==" "Category"}},"category":"{{value}}"{{/if}}{{#if name "==" "Status"}},"status":"{{value}}"{{/if}}{{#if name "==" "Filter"}},"filter":"{{value}}"{{/if}}{{/each}},"preorder":"{{pre_order}}","kw":"{{#each custom_fields}}{{#if name "==" "Keyword"}}{{value}}{{/if}}{{/each}}","price":"{{price.without_tax.value}}"}{{#unless @last}},{{/unless}}
{{/each}}
]
{{/partial}}
{{> layout/json}}
